title: Flavour Judge

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Ask a spectator whether a thing that just happened made logical sense flavour-wise.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If they say it doesn't, the thing that happened is reversed.
- If the thing never happened in the first place, you're modkilled for being stupid.
- You may only use this once each day/night, regardless of whether it's successful.

desc:
Post 734
*"And then a maid working for organized crime stopped the flow of time, and a few schmucks with guns stoned a literal dragon to death!"*
*Aigoo - "Yeah makes sense to me."*
